game_description: VIVE Sync serves as a secure and flexible space where business professionals can discuss, collaborate, and share ideas seamlessly regardless of time and locations. A custom avatar solution coupled with a full body avatar simulation, a virtual 3D environment, and many more features makes working remotely as effective as working in shared office. Visit our website: https://sync.vive.com/ to book your meeting.
Languages: English, Chinese (China), Chinese (Taiwan), Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian (Nynorsk), Polish, Russian, Spanish (Spain), Swedish
review_1: I don't remember, and all this work from home VR social office stuff looks the same to me.
